crusade.end_of_round.tooltip.content: You are forced to End your Round (sleep) at the end of this turn. This is due to external factors like the Round Timer running out of time.
crusade.final_round.tooltip.content: You are at the Last Round of the game. Ending the round by Sleeping, Discarding, Resting or Recovering will end the Crusade. Make sure you have completed all the scenario objectives before Ending the Round!
crusade.turns_remaining.tooltip.content:
When playing with a <style="value">Timer</style>, you have a limited number of turns each round. This value might fluctuate every round.

When the Timer <style="status">Runs-out</style> depending on the initiative value of the Benediction that you picked (putting you earlier or later in turn order), then you might get one additional turn.
crusade.turns_remaining.timer_initiative:
When you picked a <style="value">Benediction</style> at the beginning of the round, the Timer also received one. Depending on the initiative value of each Benediction the Timer might <style="status">tick</style> before or after you play your turn (lower initiatives go first).

When the Timer <style="status">Runs-out</style> then you might get one additional turn if your initiative is <style="status">lower</style>.
